podPrefix.description: StatefulSet prefix used for validator pod hostnames

staticNodesConfigMapName.description: ConfigMap name storing static-nodes.json entries for node discovery

securityContexts.description: Pod security context inherited by subcharts when set

labels.description: Common labels applied to all resources in the network

global.description: Global configuration shared across network subcharts
